reviews.review: Great game, highly recommended!

É uma boa continuação de Half Life 2. A hístória é bem encaixada e interessante.
Gordon e Alyx são resgatados por Vortigauns antes de serem atingidos pela explosão na torre da Citadel no final de Half Life 2. Ambos entram de novo na Citadel e tentam estabilizar o reator da torre antes que ele exploda. Após isso inicia-se uma jornada pela cidade que termina na extração deles e de membros da resistência pelos trens.
A cidade está um caos completo. Além da guerra entre a resistência e os Combine, os Antlions invadiram a cidade. Cápsulas de Headcrabs também são encontradas causando mais estrago ainda.
Durante a fuga pelos trens ocorre uma grande explosão no reator da Citadel. A onda de choque atinge do trem de Gordon e Alyx provocando um grande acidente.
Muito bom, a história cada vez fica mais incrível e interessante. Half-Life 2 se tornou um dos jogos mais memoráveis e realmente divertidos que já joguei, essa continuação ficou ótima!
GIVE US A HALF LIFE 3

This is one difficult little game. A lot shorter than the others, but what do you expect? It does say that it's an 'episode'. I enjoyed it immensely. This game doesn't treat you like an idiot and it will beat you around the head if you act like one.

Half-Life 2: Episone One adds some hours of fun to the Half-Life franchise. This game starts where Half-Life 2 ends and keeps the essence of Half-Life. You will be challenged with a bit more difficult puzzles but nothing extraordinary. Don't expect more than 6 hours to end the game and unlock all achievements. Overall, it's just more Half-Life with nothing new. If you liked Half-Life 2, you will like this new episode.

I have recently played HL2 for the first time and I hated it. I heard so many good things about it, but couldn't like it at all. Of course, the game is dated. I've got HL ep. 1 & 2  at the same time and now I'm playing this game and I hate it again. I want to play it because I don't like having games on my steam that I haven't touched, but this game frustrates me. 

I'm only at the beginning, but the girl (whatever her name is) is so annoying. She's comepletely useless and stands always in the way and takes to long to open a door. With only the gravity gun (first part of game) to kill the enemies, the game is slow and not fun for me. I hope the game changes this up a lot, because if this keeps on going like it does now, I won't finish this game and never start ep. 2. 

The game takes a lot (almost everything) from HL2, so if you liked that game, I guess you'll like this one as well. I know the half life franchise is a fan-favorite of many gamers, but for me, it's not good. There are way better shooters out there.

Half-Life 2 est pour moi l'incarnation de la perfection videoludique : Ultra immersif (Le moteur Source arrive encore à me bluffer aujourd'hui, et le level design est magnifique en plus d'être très varié), un scenario excellent, une durée de vie plus que correcte (Une vingtaine d'heures pour le joueur lambda en comptant les deux extensions), une jouabilité plus que jouissive... Bref, je vous remercie, développeurs de chez Valve, mais j'ai une question: QUAND ALLEZ VOUS NOUS SORTIR CE FOUTU HALF-LIFE 3 ?!

HL2: E1 is a better zombie survival horror game than most games that are actively trying to be zombie survival horror games.

This is the epilogue to Half-Life 2, and it plays well.  You can see the Portal-like thinking in the design, especially at the beginning areas, which are a bit puzzle-based rather than combat heavy.  The difference is rather than using a portal device, you are using the gravity gun.  You don't even start with a crowbar.  

Of course, this is just while the game prepares to return to form.  By the time it's over, you'll be back with crowbar in hand and a full array of weapons.  As well as the return of Gordon's followers.

The game emphasizes the follower/NPC mechanics, as not only will Gordon have NPC followers helping him through parts of the game, but Alyx follows him for most of the game.  Rather than being a burden to be protected like too many escorts, however, Alyx is an active combatant, and more than holds her own.  You'll be glad she's there to draw fire and take down enemies at your side, and you'll notice the few times when she's pulled away to perform a background task and you have to go it solo.  

It is a little abrupt, but it is worthy appendix to Half-Life 2's gameplay and storyline.

Even though it is a great addition to Half-Life 2, this is the only title of the three Half-Life 2 chapters that falls a bit short, mostly because the game is very short itself, in terms of value, the smart thing to do would be to pick Episode One up with a Half-Life bundle or in the sales.

Disregarding it's length, it is just another brilliant addition and a must-have for Half-Life fans, it continues the story and has great game play just like Half-Life 2 itself. You can't have Half-Life 2 without episodes 1 & 2. Period.

This sequel to the popular and somewhat required game 'Half-Life 2' although shorter than the previous game, is worthy of becoming part of that franchise as it continues the story of the  revolution against the combine in a flawless transition between the base game and episode 1. This game is also required to unlock more possibilities for modding on games such as Garry's Mod. 10/10

Continues straight from Half Life 2 so if you haven't finished it this won't make any sense and will spoil the ending of HL2. I'd highly recommend this game to any who are eager to finish the story of this great franchise!

Half-life 2 Episode One, the continue of Half-life 2.. Now you will know what happen next right? Now let's review it!

The Gameplay:
It's still very fun, you can't go serious at this in anyway... if you're a tryhard player you will. The weapons are still the same but they're so fun messing with it.. The Gravity Gun is the most fun weapon in the game.. so please try to enjoy the game instead of being a 100% tryhard.

The Graphics:
It improved the graphics than Half-life 2, at least.. playing in 720p won't take it's full effect.. so I highly suggest play this on 1080p and you will see it's texture improvement.

The AI's *Artifical Intelligence*:
Same as Half-life 2 but the AI's are now good.

Rating: 9/10
Why not 10/10?, Cause I can't give a game that is 10/10..
I highly suggest people buy this only for Half-life Series Fan or a FPS Shooter Fan.

Bastante flojo.
He de decir que no es la primera vez que lo juego, en su dia, cuando salio hace 8 años jugue la saga completa y me encanto, pero ahora, rejugandolo, he visto que el episodio 1 flojea bastante respecto al half life 2 original o el episodio 2.
Su duracion apenas me ha llegado a las 3 horas, y yo no soy de los que va corriendo para pasarselo todo rapido, suelo fijarme bastante en los detalles. El juego tiene como dos mitades claramente diferenciadas, la primera es bastante repetitiva, aburrida y nada novedosa, reciclada del half life 2, ademas de que te hace tragarte largas conversaciones sin nada de contenido (no me importaria si fuesen conversaciones interesantes, pero no lo son).
La segunda parte del juego, es algo mas entretenida, pero tampoco muy novedosa. Trae un nuevo tipo de enemigo y alguna situacion interesante nueva a nivel jugable, pero nada importante respecto a la jugabilidad base de half-life 2. Lo que mas me gusto es una pequeña fase bastante oscura en la que depende totalmente de la linterna dandole un toquecillo survival horror.
La historia aporta mas bien poco, ya que es el mero camino entre los acontecimientos de half life 2 y los del episodio 2, ambos mucho mas interesantes. 
finalmente decir   
      ***CUIDADO POSIBLES SPOILERS****
______________________________
                        Que el final de este episodio nos deja con una situacion practicamente identica a la del final del half life 2. por lo que nos deja una sensacion de no haber avanzado absolutamente nada en la trama. 
______________________________

Mi recomendacion es: jugadlo si quereis obtener la experiencia completa de la saga half life, pero dejadlo de lado si lo que quereis es simplemente jugar un shooter. El episodio 2 le da mil vueltas a este en historia, duracion y novedades.

Сюжет данного эпизода начинается сразу после окончания второй части. ИИ противника улучшился, по сравнению со второй частью  и нам (да возрадуемся друзья!) дадут норм спутника в виде Аликс. Всего сюжета этого эпизода раскрывать не буду, да и в общем о нем можно рассказать за 5 минут, ибо в эпизоде всего лишь 5 глав, которые вы можете пройти примерно за 4 часа. Конечно, все фишки игры сохранились, но если бы в ней сделали больше времени для прохождения, а не пытались нас остановить врагами и ловушкой, то я бы поставил ей 10/10, но т.к. игра короткая, то ставлю 9/10. Даже еще поблажка. 9.5/10 (т.к. это эпизод и стоило этого ожидать)

В продолжении Half-Life 2 в первом эпизоде нас ничем не порадовали а просто создали игру которую можно можно пройти за 2 часа в которой главной фишкой является "Побег из Сити-17".А именно:Смыться из цитадели,пол часа пройти через город,спасти мирных жителей у вокзала и смыться на поезде в зеленую рощу,и все !
Геймплей оставили такой же,и ничем тогда еще не удивили.Те кто не прошел первый эпизод думаю будет интересно узнать как Гордон и Аликс выбируться из Сити-17,а в остальном весь сюжет 2 части состоит из эпизодов.2 эпизод в роще самый атмосферный и по дольше чем 1 первый эпизод.Как заявил Гейб Ньюэл "Мы хотим чтоб-бы игроки проходили игру по немногу и не полностью что-бы удивить их чем то новым".И не известно есть ли 3 эпизод игры или это просто ерунда.

Геймплей: 7/10
Движок:6/10
Сюжет:10/10
Музыка:10/10
Общая оценка игре:8/10

lo que mas me gusto fue los combos cuerpo a cuerpo de alix

Decepción inmensa.

Si tuviera que definir este juego en pocas palabras, lo llamaría "3 horas más de Half-Life 2".

No trae absolutamente ninguna novedad respecto al original, es más de lo mismo (mismos enemigos, mismos escenarios, y mismas armas). La única "novedad" es que la idiota de Alyx te seguirá durante toda la aventura (la cuál está super OP y es invencible y prácticamente puede pasarse el juego sin tu ayuda y te sentirás como un señuelo humano durante todo el juego, sobretodo si vas a por el logro "La bala de plata".)

Me ha durado 3 horas.

Únicamente lo recomiendo si te gustó mucho el Half-Life 2 original, porqué este continua la historia (bueno, el juego es únicamente la huida de Ciudad 17 tras el ending del original)

Muy "meh".
